resources.string:
The app sends codes for LG TV:s via Mqtt to the broker with the subject irsender. This app requires an Mqtt broker and a Mqtt-enabled Ir-sender. The broker is a software which handles Mqtt-messages in the network. The Ir-sender is a Esp01 connected via Wifi that listens to Mqtt messages with the topic irsender (see https://github.com/bphermansson/espMqttIrblaster). When messages with this topic arrives it reads the payload and converts it to ir codes. These are then sent via the devices ir diode.
Start by opening the settings. There you set the Ip of your Mqtt-broker, the userid and the password. After that the app is ready for use.
